question: Bring out the only incorrect statement:
option1: Rajukas were appointed by Asoka as Judicial Officers
option2: The Sunga dynasty retained the title senapati, even after becoming kings
option3: Kalinganagar was an ancient city destroyed by Cyclone
option4: Asoka has expressed faith in Buddhism in Kandhar Inscription
answer: Asoka has expressed faith in Buddhism in Kandhar Inscription
explanation: Bhabru edict is known as an edict in which Asoka expressed faith in Buddhist Creed
